name: DROD: Gunthro and the Epic Blunder
description: DROD is a unique puzzle-logic game with clever mechanics and an engaging story. It is a turn-based top-down 2-D dungeon puzzler. The game play has amazing depth through emergent behaviors as puzzle elements are combined. There is a simple interface and only a handful of commands to master.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP+ Processor: 500MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 MB DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Optional
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
